memberdef.name: ARC_CONNECT_CMD_DEBUG_MASK_SH
memberdef.initializer: 0x08 /* if a self-halt occurs, a global halt is triggered */

memberdef.name: ARC_CONNECT_CMD_DEBUG_MASK_BH
memberdef.initializer: 0x04 /* if a breakpoint caused halt occurs, a global halt is triggered */

memberdef.name: ARC_CONNECT_CMD_DEBUG_MASK_AH
memberdef.initializer: 0x02 /* if an actionpoint caused halt occurs, a global halt is triggered */

memberdef.name: ARC_CONNECT_CMD_DEBUG_MASK_H
memberdef.initializer: 0x01 /* whenever the core is halted, a global halt is triggered */

detaileddescription.para: ARCv2 ARC Connect driver interface. Included by arc/arch.h.
